text:
- Intuit's mission is to power
prosperity around the world
for 100 million customers.
We're committed to helping our customers
run their financial lives with confidence

using TurboTax, QuickBooks,
Credit Karma, and MailChimp.

We really wanna make it
easy for our developers

to remediate issues as quickly
and as easily as possible.

We've decided to use Automated
Security Response on AWS

and a button that we call
Fix It for our developers
to remediate with confidence

and without having to read
an entire remediation doc,
which can be lengthy and confusing.

We've customized the Automated
Security Response system
to integrate into an internal system

that we call the Automated
Compliance Platform, or ACP.
Automated Security Response provides a way

where developers can
easily remediate issues

with high confidence that this
remediation has been tested
and would work successfully.

It dramatically reduces
the amount of time it takes
to remediate an issue by over 80%.

Anytime that a developer
can see the Fix It button,
they all want to click the Fix It button

instead of having to
remediate this manually.

Without Automated
Security Response on AWS,

it would take significantly
longer to remediate issues

that helped us improve our
overall security posture.
(upbeat music)
